actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-673.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the further expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes additional expenditures, not to exceed $94,074, for the further expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. Prohibits any part of such funds from being available for expenditure in connection with the study or investigation of any subject which is being investigated for the same purposes by any other House committee.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the further expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
